description:
Darmanitan is known as the Blazing Pok√©mon. Its ability, Zen Mode (Daruma Mode in Japan), changes its appearance to a stone statue with whitened out eyes, adds the type Psychic, its special attack and attack are swapped, and defenses are doubled.
Game Informer`s Jeff Marchiafava stated "Despite the flaming eyebrows, Darmanitan doesn`t look all that tough".
name: Hihidaruma
